text: The 2024 World Snooker Championship was a snooker tournament. It was played from 20 April to 6 May 2024. It was organised by the World Snooker Tour. It was the 17th and final ranking event of the 202324 season. The tournament was played at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. It was the 48th World Snooker Championship to be staged at the venue since 1977. The qualifying rounds were played from 8 to 17 April at the English Institute of Sport, also in Sheffield. Kyren Wilson won the event, defeating qualifier Jak Jones 1814 in the final and becoming the 28th snooker world champion. On his way to the final, Wilson eliminated Dominic Dale, Joe O'Connor, John Higgins and David Gilbert in the earlier rounds of the tournament. The defending champion was Luca Brecel who had defeated Mark Selby in the 2023 final; Brecel lost in the first round to David Gilbert. ==Main draw== The draw for the main tournament is shown below. Numbers in parentheses after the players' names denote the players' seeding for the 16 seeded players, and the rankings (in italics) for the unseeded players. Players in bold denote match winners. ===Final=== == References == Category:World Snooker Championship Category:2024 in sports
title: 2024 World Snooker Championship
